articles.description: The 'Euphoria' director's new film, 'Malcolm & Marie', has a ringside seat for a furious lovers' row. Its release has stirred up some arguments of its own
articles.content: Last year, when the pandemic started taking out blockbusters one by one, and films either halted production or kicked their release dates on and on, Zendaya called up Euphoria director Sam Levinson a… [+8006 chars]
